_header: Shall I that am so high in throne
_description: James Ryman song, 10 cross-rhymed quatrains with first repeated after each of the remaining nine as if a burden

CULEe112.First Lines:
Shalle I that am so high in troneModer shalle I doo sooShalle
                    I take dethe for man aloneAnd suffre payne and wooOf me thou hast take
                    flesshe & bonDere sonne sith thou diddest soo…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …Not vttirly thou me forsakeIn langoure payne and woo
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 234-5.
